description:
Bell Legal Group focuses on cases involving personal injury, environmental law, medical malpractice, nursing home neglect, police and prison misconduct, products liability, and auto defects. The firm combines the experience and ability of their staff of over 20 legal professionals with the personally tailored service of a smaller firm.

Founder and Senior Partner, J. Edward Bell, has been practicing in the above complex litigation areas for over 25 years. His professionalism and skill are unequaled in the court room while he approaches clients with the care and attention of a close friend.

Bell Legal Group also boasts a unique reserve of capital and resources to assist clients nationwide. Their multiple office locations throughout South Carolina allow for easier traveling for clients within the state, while their unequalled video conferencing capabilities allow attorneys to communicate with clients, experts, and other law firms around the United States.

If you or someone you know needs the assistance of an experienced firm with proven success in their areas of specialization, please contact the Bell Legal Group right away. Their Potential New Client Coordinator is waiting to give you the personalized attention you deserve with your free consultation. Don't hesitate to contact the firm with any questions.
